actions.name: Artillery (Move Change)
actions.description:
Effect: The user's next declared [Pulse], [Missile], and [Explode] Attack has the following changes applied based on its Targeting until it is resolved:

  • Creature
    • Accuracy -10
    • Range +150% (min. +2m)
  • Blast
    • Accuracy -20
    • Range +200% (min. +3m)
    • [Blast X+1]
  • Cone
    • Accuracy -10
    • Range +150% (min. +1m)
  • Line
    • Accuracy -15
    • Range +150% (min. +2m)
  • Wide Line
    • Accuracy -20
    • Range +150% (min. +2m)
  • Emanation
    • Accuracy -15
    • Range +100% (min. +1m)

actions.name: Artillery
actions.description: Effect: The user's [Pulse], [Missile], and [Explode] attacks have +15% Power.
